trans-unit.source: Your recommendation has been added and is now pending for approval.
Thank you for your recommendation. You will receive a confirmation e-mail.

%s has submitted a new recommendation on your website:
---
Recommendation archive: %s
Rating: %s
Text: %s
---
Click here to edit or publish the recommendation:
%s
This recommendation has to be published in the back end before it will appear on the website!

Thank you for your recommendation on ##domain##.
Click here to confirm your recommendation:
##link##
The confirmation link is valid for 24 hours.
If you did not submit a recommendation, please ignore this e-mail.
